name: Mara Jade
info:
• 简体中文名: 玛拉·杰德
  • 别名: Mara Jade Skywalker
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 17 BBY
  • 身高: 1.6 m
  • 引用来源: https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Mara_Jade_Skywalker
  • 卒日: 40 ABY
detail: Mara Jade Skywalker, a Force-sensitive human female who was during different times in her life, an Emperor's Hand, a smuggler, and later a Jedi Master who sat upon the Jedi High Council.
